examples: the team's leading scorer for the past two seasons
the leading provider of telecommunications services in Denmark
She was offered the leading role in the new TV series.
The leading causes of death are heart disease and cancer.
Leading experts were brought to the scene of the crime.
He played a leading part in the negotiations.

meanings.def: ahead of others in a race or contest
examples: She started the last lap just behind the leading group.
These are the leading first-round scores.

meanings.def: the amount of white space between lines of printed text
